headline: Hasbro (HAS) Stock Drops Despite Market Gains: Important Facts to Note
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Hasbro (HAS) stood at $61.89, denoting a -1.68% change from the preceding trading day.

headline: Is Hasbro (HAS) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Hasbro (HAS) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: Toys and Electronics Stocks Q4 Teardown: Hasbro (NASDAQ:HAS) Vs The Rest
summary: As the Q4 earnings season comes to a close, it’s time to take stock of this quarter’s best and worst performers in the toys and electronics industry, including Hasbro (NASDAQ:HAS) and its peers.
